verses.roman:
saptama paricchede 'pañca-tattve'ra ākhyāna
pañca-tattva mili' yaiche kailā prema-dāna

synonyms: saptama paricchede—in the Seventh Chapter; pañca-tattvera—of the five tattvas (truths); ākhyāna—the elaboration; pañca-tattva—the five tattvas; mili'-combining together; yaiche—in what way; kailā—did; prema-dāna—distribution of love of Godhead.
translation: The Seventh Chapter describes the Pañca-tattva-Śrī Caitanya, Prabhu Nityānanda, Śrī Advaita, Gadādhara and Śrīvāsa. They all combined together to distribute love of Godhead everywhere.
